As an orrn player who is mastery lvl 5... Ornn is stil trash and as a jungle main I would like his tanks to be A LOT better. I don't want such a cool champion to go to waste riot!

IF anyone has any patching issues with the new patch like I did, especially being stuck at 0% / release manifest / scanning files, this is what worked for me:


Reset ‘winsock’ through the Command Prompt:

Press the Windows Key + R
Type cmd (Run Command Prompt as Admin (http://www.sevenforums.com/tutorials/11841-run-administrator.html))
Press “Ok”
Type the following: netsh winsock reset
Hit Enter
Restart your computer
Re-launch League of Legends

For PVP.NET Kernal Not Responding simply 'Run as Administrator".
